title: Windows Dev + Cybersecurity Bootstrap
description: Idempotent PowerShell bootstrap for setting up a complete Windows development and cybersecurity stack including winget, WSL2, Docker, pipx, and VS Code. Automated installation of 15+ security and development tools with safe re-run capability.
keyResults: Automated installation of 15+ security and development tools
Idempotent design allows safe re-runs without conflicts
Streamlined onboarding process for new security workstations

title: Automating Information Security
description: Course repository for CYB 631: Automating Information Security with Python and Shell Scripting. Comprehensive Python and PowerShell projects covering security automation, log analysis, and system hardening.
keyResults: Automated security assessment workflows reducing manual effort by 70%
Implemented log analysis scripts for threat detection
Created system hardening automation for Windows and Linux

title: Configuring Cloud Security in AWS
description: Hands-on cloud security project configuring Amazon EC2 instances with layered network protection using Security Groups and NACLs, integrated with CloudWatch and SNS for real-time monitoring and alerting.
keyResults: Implemented defense-in-depth using Security Groups and NACLs
Configured real-time threat monitoring with CloudWatch
Automated security alerts using Amazon SNS

title: Cybersecurity Cost Modeling Analytics
description: Reproducible analytics pipeline for CS601C graduate capstone in Applied Computational Statistics. Comprehensive 64-page PDF report covering cybersecurity cost modeling, statistical analysis, and predictive modeling.
keyResults: Built reproducible statistical analysis pipeline
Analyzed cybersecurity cost patterns and trends
Created predictive models for security budget forecasting

title: Cisco Rapid-PVST Campus Network Lab
description: Advanced Cisco Packet Tracer lab implementing Rapid-PVST with dual-homed access, per-VLAN root load-balancing, PortFast, BPDU Guard, and Root Guard for enterprise campus network security.
keyResults: Designed secure multi-switch campus topology
Implemented per-VLAN root bridge load balancing
Configured Layer 2 security features (BPDU Guard, Root Guard)

title: Inter-VLAN Routing with ROAS
description: Hands-on Packet Tracer exercise demonstrating Router-on-a-Stick (ROAS) configuration for inter-VLAN routing. Foundation lab for advanced network segmentation projects.
keyResults: Configured trunk links and subinterfaces
Implemented inter-VLAN routing with single router
Validated network segmentation and routing policies

title: x86-64 Assembly Programming Lab
description: Hands-on lab for NASM on Ubuntu 24.04 (WSL 2) containing three beginner x86-64 programs with detailed PDF report, Makefile, and comprehensive setup documentation.
keyResults: Developed three x86-64 assembly programs from scratch
Documented assembly fundamentals for security research
Created reusable Makefile for assembly workflows

title: VaultSnake - Secure Login with Game
description: Secure login GUI using Tkinter with encrypted credentials storage and a classic Snake game reward for authenticated users. Includes user-based score tracking and session management.
keyResults: Implemented secure credential storage with encryption
Built user authentication system from scratch
Created gamified security training tool

title: KokoroTTS - Offline Text-to-Speech
description: Desktop app for offline Kokoro TTS (ONNX). Includes 4 voices (2F, 2M), speed control, play/stop, and WAV export. Windows-ready with one-click installers.
keyResults: Built offline TTS application with 4 voice options
Implemented speed control and audio export features
Created user-friendly Windows installation workflow

title: TOC Extractor - Web Scraping Tool
description: GUI tool to extract chapter pages from a Table of Contents using Playwright + Tkinter. Provides URL and CSS selector inputs with headful browser support for authentication.
keyResults: Automated TOC extraction from web pages
Built user-friendly GUI with Tkinter
Implemented polite delays and authentication support
